attributes.action: Prevent the felling  of ancient English oak trees for export
attributes.background: Stately home owners have been offering ancient English oak trees from their estates for use in the rebuilding of Notre Dame Cathedral. This must not be allowed, either for this, or any future works of this nature.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the decision to protect a tree is one for the local council and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/tree-preservation-orders-and-trees-in-conservation-areas
